Situation.name: Asylum Request Denied
Situation.description: A situation where a refugee's application for asylum is rejected by the authorities.

Situation.name: Fast-Track Asylum Procedure
Situation.description: A situation where an asylum seeker's case is processed under an accelerated procedure due to inconsistencies or fraud concerns.

Situation.name: Detained in a Retention Center
Situation.description: Being held in a detention center while awaiting a decision on asylum or deportation.

Situation.name: Refused Entry at the Border
Situation.description: Denial of entry into the country, leading to a situation of legal and material precarity.

Situation.name: Living in Refugee Camps
Situation.description: Surviving in makeshift camps with inadequate living conditions while awaiting asylum decisions.

Situation.name: Prolonged Asylum Process
Situation.description: Facing long delays in the processing of asylum applications, leading to uncertainty and hardship.

Situation.name: Unaccompanied Minor
Situation.description: A child under 18 who is without a legal guardian, requiring special protection and care.

Situation.name: Statelessness
Situation.description: Lacking nationality and facing difficulties in gaining legal recognition and rights.

Situation.name: Gender-Based Violence
Situation.description: Experiencing violence or persecution based on gender, requiring specialized support.

Situation.name: Victim of Human Trafficking
Situation.description: Being exploited through human trafficking, often requiring legal and psychological support.

Situation.name: Forced Return to Home Country
Situation.description: Facing deportation or expulsion back to a country where one fears persecution.

Situation.name: Awaiting Dublin Regulation Transfer
Situation.description: Uncertain waiting period while a transfer to another EU country is being processed.

Situation.name: Inadequate Housing
Situation.description: Living in poor or overcrowded housing conditions while seeking asylum.

Situation.name: Financial Insecurity
Situation.description: Facing economic hardship and lack of income while navigating the asylum process.

Situation.name: Limited Access to Healthcare
Situation.description: Struggling to obtain necessary medical care due to legal or financial barriers.

Situation.name: Exploitation in the Informal Economy
Situation.description: Working in unregulated sectors with no legal protections or rights.

Situation.name: Lack of Legal Support
Situation.description: Insufficient access to legal assistance in navigating asylum and immigration processes.

Situation.name: Social Isolation
Situation.description: Experiencing loneliness and lack of social integration in a new country.

Situation.name: Mental Health Issues
Situation.description: Struggling with psychological distress due to trauma, uncertainty, or poor living conditions.

Situation.name: Bureaucratic Obstacles
Situation.description: Facing complex and confusing administrative procedures in seeking asylum or benefits.

Situation.name: Discrimination
Situation.description: Facing prejudice and exclusion based on race, nationality, or refugee status.

Situation.name: Family Separation
Situation.description: Being separated from family members due to immigration policies or asylum processes.

Situation.name: Lack of Access to Education
Situation.description: Facing barriers to education due to legal status or economic hardship.

Situation.name: Forced Marriage
Situation.description: Being coerced into marriage, often as a means of control or exploitation.

Situation.name: Awaiting Residency Decision
Situation.description: Experiencing prolonged uncertainty while awaiting a decision on residency status.

Situation.name: Denied Family Reunification
Situation.description: Facing rejection of applications to bring family members to join in the host country.

Situation.name: Inability to Legally Work
Situation.description: Being legally barred from employment due to asylum or immigration status.

Situation.name: Displacement Due to Conflict
Situation.description: Forced to flee home country due to war or armed conflict, leading to refugee status.

Situation.name: Children Out of School
Situation.description: Refugee or asylum-seeking children unable to attend school due to various barriers.

Situation.name: Domestic Violence
Situation.description: Experiencing violence or abuse within the home, requiring intervention and support.

Situation.name: Irregular Migration Status
Situation.description: Living without legal status, leading to vulnerability to exploitation and deportation.

Situation.name: Rejection of Protection Status
Situation.description: Denial of refugee or subsidiary protection status, leading to uncertainty and fear of return.

Situation.name: Denied Access to Healthcare
Situation.description: Refusal of medical services due to legal status or lack of documentation.

Situation.name: Language Barrier
Situation.description: Facing difficulties in communication and integration due to lack of language skills.

Situation.name: Violence in Refugee Camps
Situation.description: Experiencing physical or sexual violence while living in refugee camps.

Situation.name: Risk of Deportation
Situation.description: Facing the threat of being forcibly returned to a country where one fears persecution.

Situation.name: Lack of Shelter
Situation.description: Homelessness or inadequate shelter while awaiting asylum or residency decisions.

Situation.name: Legal Vulnerability
Situation.description: Facing legal challenges and lack of protection due to immigration status.

Situation.name: Homelessness
Situation.description: Lacking stable housing, often living on the streets or in temporary shelters.

Situation.name: Exposure to Exploitation
Situation.description: Being vulnerable to exploitation in labor, housing, or other areas due to legal status.

Situation.name: Denied Access to Social Services
Situation.description: Ineligibility for or exclusion from social services and benefits due to legal status.

Situation.name: Racial Discrimination
Situation.description: Experiencing prejudice or exclusion based on race or ethnicity.

Situation.name: Fear of Persecution
Situation.description: Living in fear of being targeted due to race, religion, nationality, or political opinion.

Situation.name: Precarious Legal Status
Situation.description: Uncertainty about legal status, leading to vulnerability in multiple aspects of life.

Situation.name: Lack of Family Support
Situation.description: Feeling isolated and without familial support in a new country.

Situation.name: Poverty
Situation.description: Living in severe economic hardship, often without access to basic needs.
